Philippines says China 'deliberately stirring up trouble' in South China SeaThe Philippines on Wednesday accused China of "deliberately stirring up trouble" in the South China Sea. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 05:38:00 GMT 4IHZ7JPDZFNURINKTIZW7AMVAU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-says-china-deliberately-stirring-up-trouble-south-china-sea-2024-03-06/Reuters世界亚太地区
Australia concerned about destabilising behaviour in the South China SeaAustralia is very concerned about unsafe and destabilising behaviour in the South China Sea, Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said on Wednesday, a day after clashes between Chinese and Philippine vessels in disputed waters. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 05:29:26 GMT KRJUMEMCLRLRGJUBUFJDPBVFI https://www.reuters.com/world/australia-concerned-about-destabilising-behaviour-south-china-sea-2024-03-06/Reuters世界
Hamas says it will negotiate through mediators until agreement reachedThe Palestinian militant group Hamas said on Wednesday in a statement they will continue negotiating through mediators until they reach a ceasefire agreement with the Israelis. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 05:09:13 GMT EWKQPCNRNNLNZFRBHWMTKJJHII https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hamas-says-it-will-continue-negotiating-through-mediators-until-agreement-2024-03-06/Reuters世界中东
Vanuatu police, aided by US Coast Guard, say Chinese vessels violated fishing lawsSix Chinese fishing boats were found to be violating Vanuatu's fisheries law after being inspected by local police who were on board the first U.S. Coast Guard boat to patrol the waters of the Pacific Islands nation, Vanuatu police and officials said. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 04:58:28 GMT 6ML56APSN5NH7L4YQWSCNEZOOQ https://www.reuters.com/world/vanuatu-police-aided-by-us-coast-guard-say-chinese-vessels-violated-fishing-laws-2024-03-06/Kirsty Needham世界
China bans imports of sheep, goats from Georgia after virus outbreakChina has blocked imports of sheep, goats and their related products from Georgia due to an outbreak of sheep and goat pox, according to a notice by the General Administration of Customs dated on March 2. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 04:45:27 GMT NQETB37F7FLWLH734QX7O7NLDU https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/china-bans-imports-sheep-goats-georgia-after-virus-outbreak-2024-03-06/Reuters商业医疗保健与制药
Three missing after boiler room blast in Russia's Tuva regionThree people were missing and 18 wounded after a boiler room blast at the Shagonar power and heating plant in Russia's remote Tuva region, regional head Vladislav Khovalyg said on Wednesday. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 04:36:06 GMT FMGULSKDPNIAFDODTJRLCNVF4Q https://www.reuters.com/world/ Three-missing-after-boiler-room-blast-Russias-tuva-region-2024-03-06/Reuters世界
UKMTO receives report of vessel being hailed by entity saying it was the Yemeni navyThe United Kingdom Maritime Trade Operations (UKMTO) agency said on Wednesday it had received a report of a merchant vessel being hailed over the radio by an entity declaring itself to be the Yemeni navy and ordering it to alter course. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 04:35:29 GMT TU5VOLEIH5IHJJ6QEROO5HRXPI https://www.reuters.com/world/ukmto-receives-report-vessel-being-hailed-by-entity-saying-it-was-yemeni-navy-2024-03-06/Reuters世界
South Korea police to question medical body officials over trainee doctors walkoutSouth Korean police on Wednesday called in for questioning officials from a doctors' association over accusations they had broken medical law, as authorities kept up pressure for trainee doctors to end a two-week walkout and return to hospitals. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 04:34:29 GMT 5V6TPTEXS5NL7DRY2IQAWBU5YA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-police-question-medical-body-officials-over-trainee-doctors-walkout-2024-03-06/Joyce Lee世界亚太地区
US now pushes UN to back 'immediate' Gaza ceasefire to free hostagesThe United States on Tuesday revised language in a draft United Nations Security Council resolution to back "an immediate ceasefire of roughly six-weeks in Gaza together with the release of all hostages," according to the text seen by Reuters. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 00:57:16 GMT AAPPITQFYZNRZKMIL4MCZB43WY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-now-pushes-un-back-immediate-gaza-ceasefire-free-hostages-2024-03-06/Michelle Nichols世界中东
ASEAN summit focus on maritime security, trade amid South China Sea tensionsAustralia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said on Wednesday that maritime security, trade and clean energy will shape the country's future with the ASEAN bloc as Beijing looks to increase its presence in the contested South China Sea. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 00:23:46 GMT Z4RAKGZ74ROHVNG4FWGOEA5O34 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/asean-summit-focus-maritime-security-trade-amid-south-china-sea-tensions-2024-03-06/Reuters世界亚太地区
Peru's prime minister steps down after alleged audio leakPeruvian Prime Minister Alberto Otarola said on Tuesday he had tendered his resignation after an audio recording came out over the weekend purporting to be of the official attempting to improperly influence government contracts. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 00:02:34 GMT AKQZUYK3TFIEJOJ5G5266TERIY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/perus-president-boluarte-make-changes-cabinet-says-minister-2024-03-06/Reuters世界美洲
